duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and execute comprehensive strategies to ensure operational excellence in a fulfillment center, focusing on Safety, Quality, Delivery, Cost, and Growth (SQDCG).
Lead, mentor, and evaluate direct and indirect reports within the fulfillment center, ensuring alignment with internal and external customers.
Implement policies and procedures to optimize the shipment of products, including safety procedures, and ensure communication channels with multiple business leaders.
Drive continuous improvement of shipment and processes, monitor metrics, and engage in employee development activities to sustain the leader in customer service and delivery.
Ensure the fulfillment center's compliance with federal, state, and local laws or regulations, and develop a culture of highly engaged business owners.
Collaborate with HR and site leaders to ensure policies and procedures support all safety, quality, delivery, and cost reduction goals.
Proactively coordinate with various business divisions to ensure that customers are being serviced according to expectation.
Engage in all safety initiatives and programs for warehouse employees, and drive continuous improvement using tools and activities focused on Safety, Quality, Delivery, Cost, and Growth (SQDCG).

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree in Logistics, Supply Chain Management, Business, or related field. Master's preferred.
